name: Poseidon
temple_description:
One of the twelve main Goddesses of Olympus, she is the Goddess in charge of the seas. Possessing infinite divine power, she can easily trigger storms and tsunamis, and often launch terrible wars when angered.
She is a Goddess that is full of ambition. She, together with Zeus and Hades, ruled the Sea, the Sky, and the Underworld respectively.

active_skills.name: Curse of the Abyss
active_skills.effect: Make enemy enter [Weaken] state that reduces their ATK by 30% for 1 round

active_skills.name: Mirage
active_skills.effect: Removes all debuffs; healing amount equals 100% of Poseidon's ATK
